com.google.android.exoplayer2.upstream.cache

Interface ContentMetadata

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    DefaultContentMetadata

    public interface ContentMetadata
    Interface for an immutable snapshot of keyed metadata.

    Internal metadata names are prefixed with "exo_". Custom metadata names should avoid this prefix to prevent clashes.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static String INTERNAL_METADATA_NAME_PREFIX
      Prefix of internal metadata names.

    • Method Summary

      Returns a metadata value.
